about_the_game:
Embark on the exciting adventure in a unique blend of story-driven, third-person adventure and dating simulator game set in an alternate universe dominated by church and its sisters.

THE STORY

Sisterhood is one of many church congregations, which members are skilled in all kinds of magic.
You play as one of the sisters, involved in special operations.
Complete missions with your sisters, rescue them from troubles, gain their affection and unlock intimate dating interactions.

MAGIC ESSENCE

Magic essence that can be harvested from demonic activity is used to craft resources, weapons or even summon powerful creatures.

CORRUPTION

Demonic activity causes corruption which is toxic for all humans, however magic essence can be used to craft powerful protection against corruption.

SUMMON

Magic essence can be used to summon fellow sisters and creatures to help you on your mission

FEATURES

  • Character Customization Options
  • Interactions with fellow sisters - gaining their affection and unlocking intimate relations
  • Environment with dynamic weather, daytime and the world itself.
  • Story-driven adventure with combat and exploration

Sisterhood is built around weapons and precision in using them. Finding enemy weak spots plays a vital role in successful combat and achieving ultimate victory.

Sometimes even the best and most powerful weapon is not enough and only a unique artifact can bring down the evil that awaits you.

Fighting mechanics aimed at precision in landing headshots in crucial to your survival

Multiple world bosses and gameplay aimed at finding enemy weakness, designed to be challenging and rewarding.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.4, AMD Athlon(TM) X2 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS, Radeon HD4000, Shader Model 3.0, 512 MB
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: If you are on or around the min spec then you may need to run with Half Res Textures and Low graphics options and at a lower resolution.
